mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Virginia: to accompany the Battle fields of Virginia ; and illustrate the operations of the Army of Northern Virginia from the Battle of Fredericksburg, 1862, to the Battle of Chancellorsville 1863 / by Jed. SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; not listed in Swem, EG. Maps relating to Virginia; map torn. [original]
